item.title: Glossary Of Terms
item.author: somebody@somewere.tld (Not Provided)
item.description: Term Type Brief Description `` [Put Input Interaction](https://riddl.tech/concepts/put input interaction/) fill out form `` [Take Output Interaction](https://riddl.tech/concepts/take output interaction/) organization added AccountingContext Context – undefined – ActivateMember Command Update state of member to Active ActivateOrganization Command – undefined – ActivateProduct Command – undefined – ActivateTenant Command A command that activates a tenant so that operations can be allowed Active Enumerator – undefined – Active Enumerator – undefined – Active Enumerator Tenant is active and suitable for use Active Enumerator – undefined – Active State – undefined – ActiveMemberHandler Handler – undefined – ActiveOrganizationHandler Handler – undefined – ActiveProductHandler Handler – undefined – ActiveProductHandler Handler – undefined – ActiveState Record – undefined – ActiveTenantHandler Handler – undefined – AddLiveUpdate Command – undefined – AddLocationReservations Command – undefined – AddMembersToOrganization Command – undefined – AddOwnersToOrganization Command – undefined – AddProductsToStore Command – undefined – AddReservationToEvent Command – undefined – AddVenueLocations Command – undefined – Address Type A generalized north american postal address AllEventIds Result – undefined – AllEventIdsView Projector – undefined – AllIdsProjections Context – undefined – AllMemberIds Result – undefined – AllMemberIdsView Projector – undefined – AllMemberIdsViewHandler Handler – undefined – AllOrgIds Result – undefined – AllOrgIdsView Projector – undefined – AllOrgIdsViewHandler Handler – undefined – AllSkus Result – undefined – AllSkusView Projector – undefined – AllSkusViewHandler Handler – undefined – AllStoreIds Result – undefined – AllStoreIdsView Projector – undefined – AllStoreIdsViewHandler Handler – undefined – AllTenantIds Result – undefined – AllTenantIdsView Projector – undefined – AllTenantIdsViewHandler Handler – undefined – AllTenantIdsViewHandler Handler – undefined – Application Enumerator – undefined – BillingAccount Entity – undefined – BillingContact Type – undefined – CAPostalCode Type A Canadian Postal Code' Calendars Context – undefined – CancelEvent Command – undefined – CancelOrder Command – undefined – Cancelled State – undefined – Cancelled Enumerator – undefined – Cancelled State – undefined – Cancelled Enumerator – undefined – Cancelled State – undefined – CancelledEventHandler Handler – undefined – CancelledOrderHandler Handler – undefined – CancelledState Record – undefined – CancelledState Record – undefined – CancelledState Record – undefined – CapacityOverview Type – undefined – ChangeEventInfo Command – undefined – CloseStore Command – undefined – Closed Enumerator – undefined – Closed State – undefined – Closed Enumerator – undefined – Closed State – undefined – Closed Enumerator – undefined – ClosedLocation Handler – undefined – ClosedState Record – undefined – ClosedState Record – undefined – ClosedStoreHandler Handler – undefined – ClosedVenue Handler – undefined – Contact Type Contact information for an individual ContactList Type There are three kinds of contacts: Primary Contacts, Billing Contacts, and Distribution Contacts.
